meanings.definition: The production and emission of light by living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The deep sea creatures use bioluminescence to light up their dark environment.
meanings.sent2: The bioluminescence of fireflies is a beautiful sight on a summer evening.
meanings.sent3: The party in the forest was so dark that they had to rely on the bioluminescence of mushrooms to find their way.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like bioluminescence, lighting up the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The bioluminescence of the jellyfish in the water created a magical and enchanting scene.

meanings.sent1: The night was illuminated by the soft bioluminescence of the plankton in the water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the intensity of bioluminescence in different marine species.
meanings.sent3: The concert hall was so dark that the only source of light was the bioluminescence of the glow sticks.
meanings.sent4: The bioluminescence of the stars in the night sky was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The bioluminescence of the fireflies created a magical atmosphere in the garden.
